se.starbox.models

Class SearchModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.starbox.models.SearchModel

  • public class SearchModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A Model class for searching files in your local index.
    Author:
    Linus, Robin, Kim

      Initiate the model instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchModel

        public SearchModel()
        Initiate the model instance. Creates an instance of Solr on startup if one has not been created already.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> find(java.lang.String inputQuery,
                                    java.lang.String params)
        Searches the index of Solr.
        Parameters:
        inputQuery - The string which you are searching for
        params - Parameters to filter the search, on this format: "filetype:exe;minfilesize:20;maxfilesize:10"
        Returns:
        Returns a list of SearchResults.
